dr.math.iterations
Class NewtonZeroFinder

java.lang.Object
  dr.math.iterations.IterativeProcess
      dr.math.iterations.FunctionalIterator
          dr.math.iterations.NewtonZeroFinder

public class NewtonZeroFinder
extends FunctionalIterator

Finds the zeroes of a function using Newton approximation. Note: the zero of a function if the value at which the function's value is zero.

Author:
Didier H. Besset
